rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with eco-friendly bamboo flooring and natural ventilation, oriented in the North-East direction per Vastu for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with large windows facing South for optimal sunlight, integrated indoor plants and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A multifunctional space used for dining and small gatherings, with views towards the garden to promote a sense of calm and balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern, eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and natural stone countertops, placed in the South-East for auspicious cooking space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest room with integrated storage, oriented in the North-West direction to promote tranquility and relaxation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, designed to maximize airflow and natural light from the East.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern ensuite bathroom designed with water-saving fixtures and natural lighting, positioned near the master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An eco-friendly rooftop terrace with green roofing and space for outdoor dining, designed to blend with the farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility space for laundry and storage, incorporating eco-friendly fixtures and located in the South-West corner to maintain balance.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A large, energy-efficient entrance door with natural wood finish in the North-West direction for auspicious entry.

openings.name: Window Series
openings.description: Large windows placed strategically on East and South facades to maximize daylight and passive solar heating while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: Rooftop Access Door
openings.description: An access door leading to the rooftop terrace, ensuring safe transition between ground floor and terrace.
